subject: Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Ben Johnson wants to present himself as a cautionary tale, a living lesson about the perils of doping, and a truth-teller in a world where he said cover-ups were as common as cleats.
snippet: Ben Johnson wants to present himself as a cautionary tale, a living lesson about the perils of doping, and a truth-teller in a world where he said cover-ups were as common as cleats.
